effect.scarlet_violet: This Pokémon transforms into a random opponent upon entering battle. This effect is identical to the move transform.
effect.the_teal_mask: This Pokémon transforms into a random opponent upon entering battle. This effect is identical to the move transform.
effect.the_indigo_disk: This Pokémon transforms into a random opponent upon entering battle. This effect is identical to the move transform.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The Pokémon transforms itself into the Pokémon it's facing.
